text: "Bedtime" is a song by American singer Usher. It was released from his album My Way (1997) in 1998. It became the fourth and last single to be released from that album. "Bedtime" was released as a promotional recording. It reached number 66 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart. ==Track listing== #"Bed Time" [Album Version] - 4:45 #"Bed Time" [Live Version] - 7:06 ==Charts== Chart (1998) Peak position == References == Category:1998 songs Category:Usher songs
title: Bedtime (song)
